info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 3:11PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Cleveland and western Gaston Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 311 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of Shelby, or near Kings Mountain, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Shelby, Gastonia, Kings Mountain, Cherryville, Bessemer City, South Gastonia, Grover, Waco, Crowders Mountain State Park and Crowders. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
